email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel: Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

We are in urgent need of a vessel to transport 15,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on FOB terms. The cargo is ready for loading, and we require a vessel with a laycan of 20-25 October. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel: Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel SEA HORIZON, DWT 45,000, LOA 190m, currently available for your cargo. The rate is USD 42 per MT. Laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel: Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel: Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Given the urgency, I can reduce the rate to USD 40 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 48 hours. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel: Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD 40 per MT sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the SEA HORIZON with a laycan of 20-25 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Liam
